FuncDef: This command displays active subscriber credit control information. Without additional filters, the output lists information for all active subscribers.

ParaDef.Info: Displays credit control information for the specified subscriber, up to 32 characters.
Displays credit control information for subscribers that are out of credit and, optionally, have the specified out of credit action enabled. Values-continue, block-category, change-service-level.

Displays credit control information for subscribers with a Diameter Gy session with EFH enabled. The optional state parameter lists subscribers for which the Diameter Gy session EFH is active, inactive, or both (all). Values-active, inactive, all.
Lists the number of matching entries for the specified filter.
